title: Sichuan Spicy Paloma
source: The Book of Sichuan Chili Crisp - Jing Gao
categories: The Book of Sichuan Chili Crisp - Jing Gao
directions: 1. In a shaker, combine the mezcal, grapefruit juice, simple syrup, and lime. Shake well and pour over ice in a glass.2. Top with the sparkling water.3. Drizzle with a few dots of chili oil on top, and enjoy.
